The leather upper of these heeled pumps features a backstrap with an adjustable buckle closure. These pumps are designed with a leather insole and synthetic rubber lining that makes them comfortable for all-day wear. With their classic silhouette and eye-catching detail, these pumps are perfect for special occasions or elevating your everyday look. Slip-on style. Pointed toe silhouette. Stiletto heels. Jersey fabric with metallic threading. OSEF-WX85. LQF246. About the designer: Founded in 2015, Oséree is the brainchild of Italian designers Jannine Vinci and Isabella Cavallin. Named after the verb “to dare” in French, the brand creates body-accentuating styles featuring luxe fabrics and rich embellishments. Courage, intrepidity and boldness are actually the values at the core of the brand, which aims to exalt women’s unique beauty and outstanding personality, with each piece expertly handmade in Italy.

products.name: Hepburn Orleana Wide Leg Jean
products.brandedName: DL1961 Hepburn Orleana Wide Leg Jean
products.description: Introducing the DL1961 Hepburn Orleana Wide Leg Jean, a stylish and sustainable denim choice for the modern woman. Featuring belt loops, whiskering, and fading details, this classic five-pocket style is perfect for any occasion. With a 31-inch inseam, 12-inch front rise, and 14-inch back rise, these jeans provide a comfortable and flattering fit. The leg opening has a 25-inch circumference, adding a touch of flair to your look. Made with 98% cotton and 2% spandex, these jeans are both durable and stretchy. Complete with a zip fly and button closure, these jeans are easy to slip on and off. Machine washable and imported, the DL1961 Hepburn Orleana Wide Leg Jean is a must-have addition to your denim collection. Model is 5'10 and is wearing a size 27; measurements may vary slightly by size. Shop now and experience sustainable denim done right with DL1961.

products.name: Congo River cutout halterneck printed cotton-poplin midi dress
products.brandedName: Johanna Ortiz Congo River cutout halterneck printed cotton-poplin midi dress
products.unbrandedName: Congo River cutout halterneck printed cotton-poplin midi dress
products.description: Dress printed cotton-poplin cutout halterneck partially elasticated waist back split ties at neck lightweight, non-stretchy fabric dry clean imported Johanna Ortiz's 'Congo River' dress is defined by cutouts along the waist that show off flashes of skin. It's made from cotton-poplin patterned with polka dots and palm trees and has adjustable ties at the front and reverse, so you can customize the fit.

products.name: The Lotus printed cotton-poplin midi dress
products.brandedName: Johanna Ortiz The Lotus printed cotton-poplin midi dress
products.unbrandedName: The Lotus printed cotton-poplin midi dress
products.description: Dress printed cotton-poplin cutout open back elasticated waist puffed sleeves back split ties at back partially lined mid-weight, non-stretchy fabric dry clean imported Printed with a signature Johanna Ortiz statement pattern, this 'The Lotus' dress is certain to make an impact. Made from organic cotton, it's cut to a chic midi length and spliced through the hem. The voluminous balloon sleeves are counterbalanced by the fitted waist and cut-out back.

products.name: Mac Duggal Rosette Chiffon Gown
products.brandedName: Mac Duggal Rosette Chiffon Gown
products.description: About The Brand:Mac Duggal s remarkable legacy is defined by sophisticated design aesthetics featuring signature luxe fabrics and the rich, opulent hand-beading traditions of his native India. Over the years, Mac Duggal has become one of the most sought-after names in women s luxury apparel and evening wear. From couture one-of-a-kind styles fabricated for the red carpet, to cocktail dresses and gowns to mark special occasions and milestone moments - every Mac Duggal design is a timeless and ageless fashion statement.
